bodydiv.p: The International Accounting Standards Board (IASB) is an independent standard-setting body of the IFRSÂ® Foundation (Foundation). Appointed, overseen and funded by the Foundation, the IASB is responsible for preparing and issuing IFRS Accounting Standards. The Trustees of the IFRS Foundation (Trustees) are responsible for governance and oversight. The IFRS Foundation Monitoring Board provides a formal link between the Trustees and public authorities to enhance the Foundation’s public accountability.
